@MarcoFalke 
gitian builds were maid against 763b839fad1125320f32d69621995277aa59dd0a
The current top commit is f642b49af73fedc6dc9af4ac299e4cfa80755583
Sorry.

Mind re-assigning "Needs gitian build"?
